page.title: 02Castle Farm.
page.content: The farm we went to visit which is in our area is called{Castle Farm. It is tenanted by{Roger Pinches. The owner is{Sir John Corbett.} There are{464 acres}of land and he has three people working for him.The machinery he owns includes 5 tractors,1 corndrill,1 plough,1 slurry tanker and a few trailers.All the large machinery, like combine harvesters he borrows from his brother who is an agricultural machinery contractor. The farm is a mixed farm but they mainly specialise in rearing{pigs.}The pigs are born there and they rear them until they are six months old and then they go to the market and are killed.They grow wheat and feed half of it to the pigs but they have to buy some of the food like fat and protein to add to the wheat.
